description:
Some of the issues found "Transfer Client between Groups" page,
Create 2 active Groups - 1. Old Group, 2. New Group.
Create 3 clients with same name (2 are Active and other 1 in pending state) under New Group.
In Same Group page Click on Transfer Clients button - in Transfer Client between Groups page the above created Clients will get displayed.
name: Issues Related To Transfer Of Clients Between The Groups
